name: Playmobil: The Movie VR Adventures
description:
DIFFERENT WORLDS, DIFFERENT GAMES

SELECT YOUR PLAYMOBIL AVATAR AND YOUR MISSION
Choose among different missions and the Playmobil avatar you want to be. Not sure which mission to take on? Play basketball while you decide.

MAKE INTERESTING FOOD
Serve the craziest burritos to an unusual Western town and discover what happens when you don’t give your customers what they order.

TELEPORT YOURSELF IN AN INFILTRATION GAME
Be careful, in this top secret base your enemies have eyes and ears everywhere. Use your teleportation spy watch and even a laser retina scan to accomplish your mission.

READY PLAYER DANCE
Show us your dance moves. Follow the moves to beat the dancing Playmobils in front of you. What score will you get?
